full_summary:
**Simultaneous Interpretation Services Contract**

**Information for Prospective Bidders**

The Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) is inviting proposals for a contract to provide Simultaneous Interpretation Services for training sessions.

**Scope of Services**

The contractor is required to provide simultaneous interpretation services for live/synchronous presentations and panel discussions using commercial web-conferencing systems (Zoom or MS Teams). The contractor must be able to supply a simultaneous interpretation service on request, from English to French and from French to English. A minimum of two qualified interpreters from English to French and from French to English must be available. Interpreters must be certified by or be members of the International Association of Conference Interpreters (AIIC) or certified by their provincial or territorial regulatory body or members of their corresponding provincial association, which ensure standards of quality for the industry.

**Security Requirements**

Reliability status will be required at the end of the bidding period.

**Contract Period**

The contract period will start from the date of contract award to March 31, 2024 (16 days). An optional one-year extension is available from April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2025 (16 days).

**Evaluation Criteria**

The successful bidder will be selected based on the lowest price.

**Bid Documents**

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and the Questions and Answers (Q&A) document, are available on the Canada BUY Connect website. A link to the tender documents is provided below:

*   <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27622/npp.zip>
*   <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27622/rfp.zip>
*   <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27622/rdim-3738379-v1-questions_and_answers_-_questions_et_reponses_0.zip>

**Contact Information**

For any questions or concerns, please contact Nancy Trépanier at OTC.soumission-bid.CTA@otc-cta.gc.ca or by phone at (873) 455-5986.

**Eligibility**

The contracting entity is the Canadian Transportation Agency. The end-user entities are not disclosed.

**Tendering Method**

This contract will be awarded through a competitive bidding process. The tender status is expired.
